definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 66:7 (but v. Je 49:24) pain, pang;—´[[ח]] abs. Is 66:7; elsewh. pl. [[חֲבָלִים]] Is 13:8 + 3 t. + Job 21:17 v. infr.; cstr. [[חֶבְלֵי]] Ho 13:13; sf. [[חֲבָלֶיהָ]] Is 26:17; [[חֶבְלֵיהֶם]] Job 39:3 (on sf. v. Ges:§ 135, 5, R 1);—pain, pang:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: obj. of [[תְּשַׁלַּחְנׇה]] Job 39:3 meton. for off spring (‖[[יַלְדֵיהֶן]]; v. Di; of goats and hinds).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sim. of distress of exiles Is 26:17; fig. of anguish of nations [[חִירִים וַחֲבָלִים יאׁחֵזוּן]] Is 13:8 (‖[[כַּיּוֹלֵדָה יְחִילוּן]]), also Je 13:21, Je 22:23, Je 49:24; of crisis of redemption Ho 13:13 (‖[[חֶבְלֵי יוֹלֵדָה]]), of birth of new Isr. Is 66:7.

of other than birth-pangs only [[חבלים]] Job 21:17; pains, pangs, sorrows (so LXX Vulgate Thes,—otherwise Add.—RobGes Hi Da al.; ‖[[נֵר יִדְעָָךְ]], [[יׇבאׁ אֵידָם]] ); > others, portion, fortune, v. [[חֶבֶל]]. p. 286
